display_information.name: Mnemosyne
display_information.description: Slack History Archiver - Bypasses free plan message retention limits by archiving all messages, channels, and files to AWS.
display_information.long_description: Mnemosyne permanently archives your Slack workspace messages, channels, and files to AWS, ensuring no message history is lost due to Slack's free plan 90-day retention limit. All future messages are automatically captured and stored securely.
